item.title: Need help editing this command[317]
item.dc:creator: @ITANKturmoil ITANKturmoil
item.description:
@ITANKturmoil wrote:

basicly what i want it to do is when someone uses this command i want it to send a server message to everyone in the game saying like (playername has used pure)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0){ addSkillXP(273742, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sM("You are now a pure."); }

Read full topic
